content: It could be because many retailers offer a wide variety of products that customers may not need to purchase on a regular or predictable basis. Additionally, retailers may want to encourage customers to visit their stores and make purchases more frequently, which annual billing would not necessarily encourage. Finally, some retailers may feel that monthly billing helps them better track customer behaviour and preferences, as they can see what product and services are being purchased in real time, allowing them to adjust their offerings quickly as needed.
